titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide for improved reliability of airline flight schedules, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 5/27/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to mandate that air carriers' representations regarding domestic airline schedules reflect the average actual arrival time for such carrier. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to: (1) conduct an ongoing review of such air carriers' representations and compliance; and (2) assess fines for violations of such mandate.
